REQUIREMENTS:

-Knights of the Nine (ALL 9 DLCs, included BattleHorn Castle!)

Nice upload,  I have much of this stuff manually downloaded from Oblivion Nexus, but this is a GREAT collection and would highly recommend this to anyone who hasn't yet played Oblivion. Hundreds of hours of game play.
